channel.title: SignalUpdateInfo Feed
channel.description: Signal news and updates. We post about new and upcoming features to keep you up-to-date with your favorite E2EE messaging app.

item.title: Signal for iOS v7.6
item.description: Release: Signal for iOS v7.6 has been released in beta.

item.title: Cloud Backups
item.description: News: Cloud backups are coming to Signal.
